titleStmt.title: Theauraujoh[n] his aurora in tranlagornm in Salem Gloria. Or The discussive of the law and the gospell betwixt the Jew and the Gentile in Salem resurrectionem
titleStmt.author: Tany, Thomas, fl. 1649-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S.B. by Hen. Hills and are to be sold by Giles Calvert at the black spread-Eagle at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Bound and filmed with Wing T158, T152D, and T156.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
